name: QuaRUNtine Adventure
description:
QuaRuntine Adventure is a Platformer game made by Keshav Sharma (Game Programmer) & Subin Philip (Art & Concept). It is in the demo version phase since we wanted to make a game in quarantine and finish it before quarantine finishes. Do let us know if you liked our game, your thoughts, and if you want to add something to the game and consider supporting our work in any way you can.
Also, don't forget to review this game on itch.io if possible. Thanks

Consider to Follow us on our Socials:
Art & Concept by Subin Philip
Insta: https://www.instagram.com/subulife/

Game Programmer: Keshav Sharma
